Title: The Perfect Mark
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Sean Hennen, Sean Hennen (executive story editor), Nic Van Zeebroeck (story editor), Michael Sopczynski (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker
Plot: While Finch still keeps Root hostage, he who can't understand why the Machine is in contact with her, he is the first to make contact with their latest number, that of hypnotherapist Hayden...
